titleStmt.title: The loyal martyrs or, bloody inquisiror [sic]. Being a just account of the mercenary and inhuman barbarities transacted in the Inquisition of Spain. ...

notesStmt.note: Verse - "Of all the nations in the universe,".
The text is in four columns, divided by rules.
On the execution of Mr. Arrowsmith and his wife.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
